name: PlepperVR
summary: VR-focused Minecraft modpack with 86 mods including ImmersiveMC, Vivecraft, Create, Mekanism, Ars Nouveau, and performance optimizations.
author: PlepperGuy

overrides.description: Vivecraft VR mod - manual installation required for VR functionality

features.name: VR Support
features.description: Full VR compatibility with ImmersiveMC and Vivecraft integration

features.name: Performance Optimization
features.description: Extensive performance optimizations with Embeddium, FerriteCore, and Entity Culling

features.name: Technology Integration
features.description: Complete tech ecosystem with Create, Mekanism, and Applied Energistics 2

features.name: Magic System
features.description: Comprehensive magic system with Ars Nouveau and related mods

features.name: Enhanced Building
features.description: Advanced building tools and decorative blocks

features.name: Farming & Cooking
features.description: Extensive farming and cooking content with Farmer's Delight
